item.title: Be a Dreamer
item.description: Be a Dreamer “Starting your own business is risky”. This is the most common reaction you get when you tell someone you’re starting your own business. In reality, the people giving you this feedback never took the risk to pursue what they dreamed of doing. Every child, teenager, and adult has a dream, don’t let that dream die from the fear of others. Once I understood the importance of money and the value it holds, building a business and securing financial freedom was my goal regardless of the risk.
